thread.title: BRIEF-Westjet Airlines Q4 Earnings Per Share C$0.42

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Westjet Airlines Q4 Earnings Per Share C$0.42
text:
Westjet Airlines Ltd:
* WESTJET REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.42 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE C$1,117.4 MILLION VERSUS C$1,017.8 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR
* QTRLY CASM, EXCLUDING FUEL AND EMPLOYEE PROFIT SHARE, 10.23 CENTS VERSUS 9.87 CENTS LAST YEAR
* QTRLY YIELD (REVENUE PER REVENUE PASSENGER MILE) 17.66 CENTS VERSUS 17.50 CENTS LAST YEAR
* QTRLY LOAD FACTOR 82.6 PERCENT VERSUS 80.2 PERCENT LAST YEAR
* QTRLY RPMS 6.329 BILLION VERSUS 5.816 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.42, REVENUE VIEW C$1.11 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY ASMS 7.659 BILLION VERSUS 7.253 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
